articles.title: Stock Market Live Updates 23 October 2025: Markets surge up on first full trading day of Samvat 2082; Sensex scales 85,000 mark
articles.description: Sensex, Nifty, Share Prices LIVE: After opening above the 85,000 mark, Sensex traded 527.32 points or 0.62 per cent higher at 84,953.66 at 9.20 am. Nifty 50 climbed 137.75 points or 0.53 per cent to 26,006.35
